00062 class Exception : public std::exception {
00063 public:
00072     Exception(const char * r = "", const char * f = "unknown",
00073             const unsigned int l = 0)
00074     throw () : _reason(r), _file(f), _line(l) {
00075     }
00076 
00080     virtual ~Exception() throw () {
00081         TraceMessage * current = tracemsg;
00082         while(current != NULL) {
00083             TraceMessage * tmp = current;
00084             current = tmp->next;
00085             delete tmp;
00086         }
00087     }
00088 
00094     const char* what() const throw () {
00095         return _reason;
00096     }
00097 
00105     virtual const char* name() const throw() {
00106         return "Exception";
00107     }
00108 
00117     void addTraceMessage(const char * message) const throw() {
00118         if(tracemsg == NULL) {
00119             tracemsg = new TraceMessage{message,NULL};
00120         } else {
00121             TraceMessage * current = tracemsg;
00122             while(current->next != NULL) {
00123                 current = current->next;
00124             }
00125             current->next = new TraceMessage{message,NULL};
00126         }
00127     }
00128 
00129     mutable struct TraceMessage {
00130         mutable const char * message;
00131         mutable TraceMessage * next;
00132     } * tracemsg;
00133 protected:
00134     const char * _reason;
00135 public:
00136 #ifndef SYLPH_DOXYGEN
00137     const char * _file;
00138     const unsigned int _line;
00139 #endif
00140 };
00141 
00142 #define S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(Class) \
00143 class Class : public ::Sylph::Exception { \
00144 public: \
00145     Class(const char * r = "", const char * f = "unknown", \
00146             const unsigned int l = 0) \
00147     throw () : _reason(r), _file(f), _line(l) { \
00148     } \
00149     virtual const char* name() const throw() {\
00150         return #Class ; \
00151     }\
00152 }
00153 
00159 S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(ArrayException);
00164 S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(FileException);
00170 S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(IOException);
00175 S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(IllegalArgumentException);
00180 S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(IllegalStateException);
00186 S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(NullPointerException);
00191 S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(SerializationException);

00197 #define sthrow(__x, __r) throw __x(__r, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00198 #else
00199 #define sthrow(__x, __r) throw __x(__r)
00200 #endif

00202 #define strace \
00203 catch(::Sylph::Exception& ex) { \
00204     ex.addTraceMessage(S_CURRENT_FUNCTION); \
00205     throw; \
00206 } do{} while(0)
00207 #ifdef SYLPH_DEBUG
00208 #define straced strace
00209 #else
00210 #define straced do{} while(0)
00211 #endif

00213 #define if_nullptr(__x) if(SYLPH_UNLIKELY(__x == 0))
00214 #define check_nullptr(__x) if_nullptr(__x) sthrow (NullPointerException, "Dereferenced a null pointer")
